text:
Fix for a known bug for 2.2 where one is not able to pass prozy usernme and 
password. Issue exists even with nightly build.

Solution:
in file  : HTTPSampler2.java
Add :      httpClient.getState().setAuthenticationPreemptive( true );
in front of:
           httpClient.getState().setProxyCredentials(...
creator: amelaao@gmail.com
sebb@apache.org
text:
Try adding the following line to httpclient.parameters (in the bin directory):

http.authentication.preemptive$Boolean=true

Does this fix the problem?

Also, it would be helpful to have some details on the "known bug" for which 
this is a proposed fix.

Email thread below describes the issue.
